name: Perfectly Fine
description:
Welcome to the splendid life of Jack. Visit his beautiful home and meet his lovely wife. Everything is perfectly fine!

Goal: Spot the differences

Controls:

Arrow Keys, A, and D to move Left or Right

Mouse to click on objects

Audio Used:

End of Show Clapping and Big Crowd Laughing https://mixkit.co/free-sound-effects/crowd/?page=2

Laugh Track https://freesound.org/people/LittleRainySeasons/sounds/395408/

Aww https://freesound.org/people/phmiller42/sounds/124996/
